scripts.build-server: cd ./src/server && npm i && npm run build && cp -r ./dist/.  ./../../build/ && cp package.json ../../build && npx prettier --write dist/index.js
scripts.build-server:coverage: cd ./src/server && npm i && npm run build:coverage && cp -r ./dist/src/server/.  ./../../build/
scripts.build-client: cd ./src/client && npm i && npm run build && cp -r ./build/. ./../../build/dist/
scripts.build-client:coverage: cd ./src/client && npm i && npm run build:coverage && cp -r ./build/. ./../../build/dist/
scripts.build-docs: cd ./src/docs && npm i && npm run build && cp -r ./build/. ./../../build/dist/docs
scripts.install-deps: cp ./src/server/package.json ./build/ && cp ./src/server/package.json ./build/ && cd build && npm install --production
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && npm run build-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-docs && npm run copy-migrations && npm run install-deps
scripts.build:coverage: rm -rf ./build && npm run build-server && npm run build-client:coverage && npm run copy-migrations && npm run install-deps
